He wants you to hunt 30 #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k that have the same red as his hair.
He says they can be easily found in #b#m103020100##k.

Report back to #b#@1052000:##k in #b#m103000000##k upon completion.

You have eliminated the #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k that have a red similar to #b#p10502000##k's hair. Seeing how you've done this ludicrous favor for him, it is obvious that you are a very kind and generous person.

You know, I really like my red hair. But a few days ago, I went outside and spotted a monster that had the same color hair as me. I was just slightly peeved at first, but now I'm very offended! Will you help me?

If you go to #b#m103020100##k, you'll find #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k. I hate their Red Ribbons, because it's the exact same red as my hair!\n\nCould you eliminate 30 of them? That would really make me feel better.
Oh, you must be quite the busy one!
Have you defeated them all? Ah, what a relief!
I know it was a silly favor, but I really appreciate your help. You're going to be an awesome adventurer! Haha!
